name: My, what a big...sword
description:
Defend the sacred gem for as long as you can with the help of your giant blade

A game for GDL's 32nd game jam.

Theme: Size does matter

Controls:

"W"/"Up" to grow your sword 

"W"/"Up" to shrink your sword

--------------------------------------

Programming and Art by Leecra

Sound FX  from https://www.zapsplat.com:

  • https://www.zapsplat.com/music/broken-glass-impact-slam-hard-hit-3/
  • https://www.zapsplat.com/music/male-voice-says-game-over-1/
  • https://www.zapsplat.com/music/cartoon-mouth-saliva-squelch-squish-11/
